high_descs: Turn to the left and move forward to the window ledge.
Pick up the clock that is on the window ledge.
Turn around completely and walk over to the small stand that is to the right of the door.
Turn on the lamp that is on the small stand.
anns.task_desc: Examine a clock using the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn and go to the desk.
Pick up  the clock on the desk.
Turn and go to the chest of drawers by the door.
Turn on the lamp on the chest of drawers.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the chest of drawers by the door.

high_descs: Turn to the left and face the shelf by the window with the plant and clock on it.
Pick the clock up from in front of the window.
Turn around and cross the room to stand in front of the lamp on the cabinet.
anns.task_desc: Pick a clock up and turn a lamp on.
